options.name: Natural Magic
options.description: You cannot benefit from a conduit, but instead become your own conduit, gaining a base power and power regeneration equal to double your level.

options.name: Free Action : Amplify
options.description: After Channeling a Spell, spend an additional 1 power to charge it

options.name: Action [Daily] : Restorance
options.description: Once per day, you restore power to either yourself or a conduit in an amount equal to 2d4 + your Spell Damage. The dice increases to 2d8 at level 7 and 3d10 at level 9.

options.name: Mind for Magic
options.description: Gain +1 Arcanum, +1 Resistance and +2 Psychic Mitigation

options.name: Reaction : Absorption
options.description: In response to a spell being channeled against you, use resistance as your defense check. On a failure, if the spell has a damage component, reduce that by half before applying mitigations. On a success, the spell does not affect you and you gain power equal to the amount used to channel the spell.
